VentilationControl
Normal
IVentilationControlService.SetTargetVolumesByLevel(MostRecentNormalLevel);
CrossVentilation
IVentilationControlService.SetTargetVolumes( IVentilationControlConfiguration.CrossVentilationInletVolume, IVentilationControlConfiguration.CrossVentilationExhaustVolume);
BurstVentilation
IVentilationControlService.SetTargetVolumes( IVentilationControlConfiguration.BurstVentilationInletVolume, IVentilationControlConfiguration.BurstVentilationExhaustVolume);
Automate
IVentilationControlService.SetTargetVolumes( IVentilationControlConfiguration.AutomateInletVolume, IVentilationControlConfiguration.AutomateExhaustVolume);
FreshAirRaised
IVentilationControlService.SetTargetVolumes( IVentilationControlConfiguration.FreshAirRaisedInletVolume, IVentilationControlConfiguration.FreshAirRaisedExhaustVolume);
FreshAirReduced
IVentilationControlService.SetTargetVolumes( IVentilationControlConfiguration.FreshAirReducedInletVolume, IVentilationControlConfiguration.FreshAirReducedExhaustVolume);
HeatPumpControlRequestLevel2
IVentilationControlService.SetTargetVolumesByHeatPumpRequest( VentilationLevelRequest.Level2, MostRecentNormalLevel, InletAirHeatPumpRequest);
HeatPumpControlRequestLevel3
IVentilationControlService.SetTargetVolumesByHeatPumpRequest( VentilationLevelRequest.Level3, MostRecentNormalLevel, InletAirHeatPumpRequest);
HeatPumpControlRequestDefrostOrDripOff
IVentilationControlService.SetTargetVolumesByHeatPumpRequest( VentilationLevelRequest.DefrostOrDripOff, MostRecentNormalLevel, InletAirHeatPumpRequest);
VentilationOff
IVentilationControlService.SetTargetVolumes( IVentilationControlConfiguration.OffInletVolume, IVentilationControlConfiguration.OffExhaustVolume);
VentilationAway
IVentilationControlService.SetTargetVolumesByLevel(MostRecentNormalLevel);
EmergencyOff
IVentilationControlService.SetTargetVolumes(0.00, 0.00);
